description: This is a source file defining the root layout component for a Remix-run React application. It imports necessary Remix components and sets up HTML structure, styles, and layout logic.

methods.name: links
methods.description: Defines external links and stylesheets to include in the HTML head.

methods.name: Layout
methods.description: React component that provides the overall HTML layout including head elements and body structure.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Default React component rendering the Outlet for nested routes.
